divs: sighting detailsi was looking out my window towards the south\south east sky when i noticed lights in the sky that seemed to be an airplane to me. after watching it for a few minutes i realized it was not an airplane or helicopter...this was approx 1:30 am est. as i watched it more, it would move up, move down, very quickly and precisely. it would hover, it was high up in the sky. after watching it for awhile i ran outside with a pair of binoculars to try to get a better visual on it. it seemed to be moving farther away from my sight. as i went outside to watch it i couldn't find it. so i went back inside to the window i was watching it from and it was still there, so after getting my bearings back down on where to look, i went back outside. as i looked up, it took off...as in, there was a streak of light, almost like a shooting start, but this was a straight path across the night sky. it went right across orions belt heading west. at that point i knew it was to be an unknown flying object. i like to look up at the night sky, and on clear nights like these you can see a lot of the stars. this is not the first time i had observed a ufo in the sky. i was just laying in bed watching tv and looked out the window when i noticed the strange lights. it appeared to me it was very high up in the sky, and after watching it make its maneuvers i realized it was not an airplane or helicopter. i was excited to see it in the sky and just watched it. this is not the first time i have seen objects in the sky that display this type of behavior.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Akron
There were no other sightings in Akron on or around November 24th 2011
Summary: Object in sky, watched it hover and zig zag some, then it left
